503 — Service unavailable

Something is breaking while executing. In most cases this error is connected to code errors, not to hardware problems.

Tips for the developer

  • Check the PHP error logs. Most likely you will find a hint.
  • Review your latest code changes.
  • Check the metrics to see if there traffic spike.
  • Maybe it's us. Please also check the fortrabbit status.
•fortrabbit — PHPower to the PHPeople
